changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_counts') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_counts GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_counts @account_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT shard_id, counts FROM dbo.Character_Counts WHERE account_id = @account_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_counts') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_counts GO
